neighborhood_overview: Kingston upon Thames is a vibrant Surrey market town at the heart one of London’s liveliest boroughs. The town is in a beautiful location as it nestles on the banks of the River Thames and, as it’s just 12 miles south west of central London, it’s the ideal place to escape to from the City. Kingston boasts everything you would expect from a thriving market town including superb shopping, a vibrant café culture, a well respected university and a great nightlife. Events in Kingston include a packed schedule of art, music, theatre and family events throughout the year, so whenever you visit Kingston you’ll find plenty to do. Kingston’s history dates back to 838 when the town was first recorded in a royal document, and by the tenth century the town made its mark on history when it became a coronation place for Anglo Saxon kings.
